name: Ex-Nokian
value: It's a thing, ex-Nokia speak about Nokia like no other. Shame Microsoft fucked us.

name: Environmentalist
value: Eco-status: "Acutely awake" We don't fly anymore, switch to plant based diet, hemp insulating our flat, removing gas from our home, work from home, talk about climate change to anyone and everyone in a non-aggressive way.

name: Father
value: A childs life is a parents life, all we can do to prepare him for this fucked up world.

name: Challenger mindset
value: One of Nokia core values, along with accountability, empathy, disrupter values that resonated at my time there and continue to shape my behaviours and decisions. We must challenge everything we 'know' for we really all know very little.
